main.*:
{{Incpage}}

'''Dick Clark''' was an American radio host and television personality. He was famous for hosting the long running variety show ''American Bandstand. ''Clark died of a heart attack on April 18, 2012 in Santa Monica, California. He guest starred as himself in "[[The One With The Monkey]]".  Later in the series, Janine invites Monica and Ross to a recording of ''Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve ''in which Ross and Monica perform their dance routine from high school.  (''The One With The Routine'').
